name: Your Fleet
description:
Hey! Thanks for playing this game. I made it in 3 days for the Indie Cookie Awards 2 in Clickteam Fusion 2.5. The game's not much, actually not very good, but still, I'm proud of what I made in 3 days. Anyways, here's how to play.

HOW TO PLAY

The game's pretty simple at face value. You install things to keep out the raiders. It is slightly strategy-based, though. It's not too hard, but just keep your wits about you. I'll go over the items real quick.

Wool Wall: This subtracts the amount of people in your fleet killed every 3 seconds by 2.

Mad Cows: These cows will kill 10 raiders every 3 seconds.

20 People: Basically what it says it is. Gives you 20 more people in your fleet.

T-Shirt Cannon: Will kill 5 raiders every 2 seconds.

X-Ray: Will kill 30 raiders every 10 seconds.

Thanks for playing!

~Aden, Village Idiot Games

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5

#cookieawards2
